titleStmt.title: In camera Scaccarij. Maij 1608. Directions for commissioners with the steward of each mannour, aswell for admitting of tenants to copy hold estates, as for assessing of fines of the same. Resolued on by the right Honourable Robert Earle of Salisbury L. high Treasourer of England, Sir Iulius Cæsar Knight, Chancellour and vnder-Treasourer of his Maiesties Exchequer at West-minster, Sir Laurence Tanfield Knight, L. Chiefe Baron, and the rest of the barons there.
Directions for commissioners
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of Exchequer.
Salisbury, Robert Cecil, Earl of, 1563-1612.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer ot the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A" within a mortised ornament; the last leaf is blank.
In this edition, line 8 of the title ends: Robert.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Robert Barker, printer ot the Kings most Excellent Maiestie
